doc:
Maurice Gosfield https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Maurice_Gosfield 0 Maurice Lionel Gosfield (January 28, 1913 – October 19, 1964) was an American stage, film, radio and television actor, most famous for his portrayal of Private Duane Doberman on the 1950s sitcom The Phil Silvers Show and voicing Benny the Ball in Top Cat. Maurice_Lionel_Gosfield ( January_28_,_1913 – October_19_,_1964 ) was an_American_stage , film_,_radio_and_television_actor , most_famous for his_portrayal of Private_Duane_Doberman on the_1950s_sitcom The_Phil_Silvers_Show and voicing Benny the_Ball in Top_Cat .
